name: src/client-helper.js
ClientHelper
description: Provide utilities and abstraction on CometD Transport layer

name: connectionEstablished
description: Notify listeners when connection is established

name: connectionBroken
description: Notify listeners when connection is broken

name: messageLost
description: Notify listeners when a message is lost

name: connectionClosed
description: Notify listeners when connection is closed

name: initialized
description: Notify listeners when connection is established

name: authenticationFailed
description: Notify listeners when handshake step succeed

name: updateServerUrl
description: Remove current server url from the server list and shuffle for another one

name: setHandshakeStrategy
description: Set a new handshake factory methods

name: subscribe
description: Subribe all methods defined in the serviceListener for the given prefixed channel

name: unsubscribe
description: Unsubcribe all subscriptions defined in given subscriptions object

name: addConnectionStatusListener
description: Add a connection listener to handle life cycle connection events

name: src/client.js
Client
createServicePublisher
description: Create a service publisher based on publisher definition for the given deployment id

name: subscribeListener
description: Subscribe all methods described in the serviceListener for the given deploymentId

name: addConnectionStatusListener
description: Add a connection listener to handle life cycle connection events

name: handshake
description: Force disconnect/connect with new handshake factory

name: getServiceListener
description: Get a service lister from methods list with a default handler

name: src/cometd.js
FetchLongPollingTransport
description: Implements LongPollingTransport using borwser fetch() API

name: src/connection-status.js
onConnectionBroken
description: Callback fired when connection is broken

name: onConnectionClosed
description: Callback fired when connection is closed

name: onFailedHandshake
description: Callback fired when an error occurs in handshake step

name: onMessageLost
description: Callback fired when a message is lost

name: onSuccessfulHandshake
description: Callback fired when handshake step succeed

name: src/definitions.js
src/handshake.js
src/index.js
content:
import * as definitions from './definitions'

export { AuthentFactory } from './handshake'
export { API_URL, Client } from './client'
export { SmartClient } from './smart-client'
export { AbstractTokenPersistenceStrategy, LocalStorageTokenPersistenceStrategy } from './token-persistence'
export { definitions }

name: src/smart-client.js
src/token-persistence.js
src/utils.js
